paper_abstract: We give simple, self-contained proofs of the basic hardness results for the classes W[t] of the weft hierarchy. We extend these proofs to higher levels of the hierarchy and illuminate the distinctions among its classes. The anti-monotone collapse at W[1, s] and the normalization of weft-t formulas arise as by-products of the proofs. (c) 2005 Published by Elsevier B.V.
